place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Vasona Lion Safari Park
category: Wildlife Sanctuary / Safari Park / Adventure / Conservation
timings: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM; closed on Mondays. silvassaonline.in+1
entry_fee: ~ ₹25 per adult; child rate less (~₹10) for safari; further charges may apply. silvassaonline.in
best_time: October to March (pleasant weather). Monsoons might hamper safari paths. webindia123.com+1
nearest_railway: Vapi Railway Station (~18 km from Silvassa). dnh.gov.in+2Holidify+2
nearest_bus: Silvassa Bus Stand (in Silvassa) — local buses etc. TripXL+1
nearest_airport: Mumbai (Chhatrapati Shivaji International) ~170-180 km; Surat Airport ~130-140 km. dnhddtourism.in+2adventure.tourism.gov.in+2
accessibility: Accessible by road from Silvassa (about 20 km along Khanvel Road); uses caged SUVs/mini-buses internally; walking inside safari limited; not wheelchair‐friendly inside safari due to terrain. silvassaonline.in+1
guided_tours: Safari drives are organized; local guides / forest department staff conduct them. Silvassa -+1
parking: Parking available near entrance; modest fees or free depending on facility (Not documented fixed charge).
nearby_amenities: Small shops, eateries in Silvassa; local transport; limited amenities inside safari area.
official_website: DNH Tourism pages mention it. simadnh.org+3dnh.gov.in+3Holidify+3
wikipedia: Part of Dadra and Nagar Haveli Wildlife Sanctuary — Wikipedia “Dadra and Nagar Haveli Wildlife Sanctuary”; Vasona Lion Safari mentioned under that. Wikipedia
special_notes: Part of larger wildlife sanctuary combining with Satmalia Deer Park; purpose includes conservation of Asiatic Lions and other animals. Wikipedia+1

place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Satmalia Deer Park (Satmaliya Deer Sanctuary / Satmalia Deer Sanctuary)
category: Wildlife Sanctuary / Nature / Bird / Picnic Spot
timings: Two slots daily — morning 7:00-11:00 AM & evening 3:00-6:00 PM; closed on Mondays. silvassaonline.in+2silvassaonline.in+2
entry_fee: ₹25 per Indian national; ₹100 per foreign national; movie camera ticket extra (~₹100) when required. silvassaonline.in+2Yourvacationtrip.com+2
best_time: Post-monsoon (October-March) for clearer weather; also monsoon when greenery is lush. Yourvacationtrip.com+1
nearest_bus: Silvassa — local bus stand in town. TripXL+1
accessibility: Park accessible by road; internal transport via gypsy/van; walking inside limited; vehicles inside via hour slots; not wheelchair friendly in wild zones. silvassaonline.in+1
guided_tours: GV vehicles / forest department vans / guides; limited capacity so early arrival helps.
parking: Available at the entrance; modest fees or included in ticket (Not documented exact amount beyond entry).
nearby_amenities: Food stalls/refreshment at entry or nearby; basic restrooms; Silvassa town for full amenities.
wikipedia: Part of Dadra and Nagar Haveli Wildlife Sanctuary page. Wikipedia
special_notes: Machan/watchtower by water hole gives good wildlife watching opportunities; east-west of Khanvel Road; known for deer species and birdlife.

place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Dudhni / Dudhni Lake / Aquaserene Tourist Complex, Dudhani
category: Lake / Water Sports / Recreational / Natural Scenic Beauty
timings: Daylight hours; boating/shikara rides available during the day. Not documented exact opening/closing times.
entry_fee: Not documented fixed for general entry; boat / water sport charges extra.
best_time: October to March (pleasant weather); monsoon for views though water levels change. silvassaonline.in+1
nearest_bus: Silvassa Bus Stand; local transport from Khanvel or Silvassa. silvassaonline.in+1
accessibility: Road access; cottages for stay; water sports equipment available; terrain flat around lake.
guided_tours: Local operators for boating, kayaking, etc.
parking: Parking near the lake complex; likely nominal charges. Not documented exact figure.
nearby_amenities: Cottages, restaurants, boat-rentals; nearby town Silvassa provides full amenities.
official_website: DNH tourism / Silvassa tourism pages. dnh.gov.in+2dnhonline.in+2
wikipedia: No dedicated page for Dudhni Lake; mentions in tourism guides. Not documented dedicated WP page.
special_notes: Called “Aquaserene”; scenic natural lake formed by dam reservoir; popular with city dwellers for weekend getaways.

place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Vanganga Lake Garden (Dadra Garden / Island Garden, Vanganga Lake)
category: Garden / Lake / Picnic Spot / Scenic Beauty / Recreational
timings: Typically open during daylight; gardens / lake area accessible early morning to evening. Not documented fixed hours.
entry_fee: Not documented standard fee; likely nominal or free for general entry; boat rides etc extra.
best_time: October-March; cooler weather; monsoon adds to greenery but some paths may be muddy.
accessibility: Well maintained walking paths, bridges, thatched huts; accessible by road; partly wheelchair friendly in garden areas.
guided_tours: Not formal; local guides / tour-operators may help; self-guided works well.
parking: Parking near garden; modest charges or free depending on garden area. Not documented exact.
nearby_amenities: Shops, small eateries, benches, resting spots; Silvassa town amenities.
official_website: Silvassa tourism pages / DNH UT pages. Silvassa -+1
wikipedia: Not documented; appear in travel & tourism guides. Not documented a dedicated WP page.
special_notes: Japanese style bridges; the “island garden” is accessed by bridges; popular for picnics, photography; local flora including medicinal plants.

place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Hirwa Van Garden
category: Garden / Scenic Beauty / Natural & Picnic Spot
timings: Garden open during daylight hours; no precise opening/closing times found. Not documented
entry_fee: ~ ₹20 per person (Indian nationals) in some sources. silvassaonline.in+1
best_time: October-March; monsoon views good but pathways can be slippery.
nearest_bus: Silvassa Bus Stand; local connections from Khanvel / Silvassa. silvassaonline.in+1
accessibility: Park paths well maintained; lawns; benches; moderate walking; relatively accessible near entrance.
guided_tours: Minimal; local caretakers / guides occasionally; mostly self-guided.
parking: Parking available nearby; modest charges or free in many cases. Not documented exact value.
nearby_amenities: Silvassa city restaurants; shops; local refreshments; garden infrastructure.
wikipedia: Not a dedicated page; mentioned in tourism guides. Not documented WP page.
special_notes: Named after tribal deity; small artificial waterfalls, twin arches, flower beds; popular for evening strolls and family outings.

place_name: Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Tribal Museum, Silvassa
category: Museum / Cultural / Heritage / Tribal Life Exhibition
timings: Generally 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM daily; may have closed days (Monday or holidays) — Not documented full schedule. silvassaonline.in+1
entry_fee: Likely free or minimal; Not documented exact fee.
best_time: Year-round; morning or afternoon when climate is moderate; cooler months (Oct-Mar) more comfortable.
accessibility: Located in Silvassa town; easy road access; infrastructure present; largely accessible.
guided_tours: Museum staff / guides may explain; informational boards; local languages + Hindi/English.
parking: Nearby city parking; charge minimal or free depending on proximity. Not documented rate.
nearby_amenities: Shops, restaurants, city services; souvenir shops; local handicrafts.
wikipedia: No dedicated WP page; part of travel writeups. Not documented WP page.
special_notes: Displays tribal (Dhodia, Kokna, Varli etc.) culture: masks, musical instruments, traditional jewelry, warli paintings, etc.; good for those interested in ethnography and local culture.

place_name: Bindrabin / Silvassa (Dadra & Nagar Haveli) — Tapovan Tourist Complex, Bindrabin
timings: Daylight access; temple likely open in morning-evening. Not documented precise hours.
entry_fee: Not documented fixed fee; temple likely donation-based.
best_time: October-March; pleasant weather; avoid monsoon for road travel.
nearest_bus: Silvassa Bus Stand; local roads to Bindrabin. silvassaonline.in+1
accessibility: Some walking from parking; small elevation changes; rural setting; roads may be narrow in parts.
guided_tours: Local guides available for temple history; no formal tour in many guides.
parking: Available near temple / tourist complex; any charge Not documented.
nearby_amenities: Very basic shops/restaurants around; better amenities in Silvassa.
wikipedia: No dedicated page; mentioned in travel guides. Not documented WP page.
special_notes: Temple site, scenic forested surroundings; “Tapovan” suggests forested area; used for spiritual retreats / calm nature

accessibility: Well-connected by road; motorable roads till dam site
guided_tours: Not regular; local guides may assist
nearby_amenities: Food stalls, rest areas, boating services nearby
special_notes: Surrounded by lush forests; great for photography, fishing & birdwatching.

place_name: Bal Udyan Park (Silvassa, Dadra & Nagar Haveli)
accessibility: Easy access by road within Silvassa
special_notes: Best for families with kids; offers toy train rides, mini zoo section, boating facility.

accessibility: Good road connectivity; wheelchair access available
special_notes: Showcases tribal artifacts, hunting tools, musical instruments, jewelry & handicrafts.

place_name: Satmaliya Deer Park (near Khanvel, Dadra & Nagar Haveli)
accessibility: Motorable road access; safari vehicle service available
special_notes: Home to deer, peacocks, wild boars, and several bird species.

guided_tours: Not required; priests provide basic info
special_notes: Dedicated to Lord Shiva, surrounded by greenery and gardens; attracts pilgrims and tourists alike.

accessibility: Road accessible; some inner trails need trekking
guided_tours: Yes, homestay owners & local guides available
nearby_amenities: Tribal huts, homestays, forest rest houses
special_notes: Known for tribal lifestyle experiences, bamboo handicrafts, and proximity to Madhuban Dam.
Houses temples, meditation centers, landscaped gardens; attracts both tourists & devotees.

best_time: October – March (cool breeze, ideal for boating)
accessibility: Good road connectivity; lake approachable by vehicles
guided_tours: Yes, local boating & tribal village tours available
special_notes: Known as “Kashmir of the West” for its scenic views; jet-skiing, kayaking & shikara rides available.

place_name: Vanganga Lake Garden (Dadra, near Silvassa, DNH)
nearby_amenities: Food kiosks, benches, pedal boats, restrooms
special_notes: Famous for Bollywood movie shootings; boating & evening walks are popular.

guided_tours: Not required; priests available for religious guidance
special_notes: Beautifully designed temple complex dedicated to Lord Krishna; peaceful surroundings ideal for meditation.
